verbose_text: Rabphilin 3a consists of an N-terminal domain that binds Rab3a and Rab27a, a linker region that binds 14-3-3, and two tandem C2 domains that bind Ca 2+ and phosphatidylinositol 4,5-bisphosphate (PIP2) (Kato et al., 1996; Shirataki et al., 1993; Sun, Bittner, & Holz, 2003).
evidence: binds Rab3a and Rab27a, a linker region that binds 14-3-3, and two tandem C2 domains that bind Ca 2+  and phosphatidylinositol
